images.copyright: Night sky over Malham, North Yorkshire (© Stephen Dinsdale/Alamy Stock Photo)
images.title: Sparkling skies
images.caption: It was a dark and starry night...
images.desc: Light pollution can pose a problem for stargazers hoping to catch a glimpse of the Milky Way. But for those prepared to wrap up warm and head out on these dark nights, some of our national parks offer stellar views. Our homepage image was taken over the village of Malham, in the Yorkshire Dales National Park which, alongside the North York Moors National Park, offer some of the best night skies in England.
